text: Thomas Maddison (16 December 1910–unknown) was an English footballer who played for Mansfield Town. Maddison played twice for Mansfield in the 1933–34 season, both matches coming in cup competitions, against New Brighton in the FA Cup and Walsall in the Football League Third Division North Cup. In December 1934, he joined SC Nimes, who played in the French Division 1. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:date of death unknown Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Year of death missing
title: Tom Maddison
